name: GNTT Timezone Clock
author: Golzarrahman

sections.description: This plugin will make a display of a live clock in your posts, pages and widget text with your location’s timezone. plugin url:’http://market.mathgr.com/gntt-timezone-clock/’
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents,
  2. Upload the folder local-time-clock to your WP plugin folder /wp-content/plugins/ directory,
  3. Go to Plugins > Plugins, and activate the plugin,
  4. To display the GNTT Timezone Clock in your pages , posts and widget text. Just install the plugin and copy and past the shortcode “[clock]”. Where do you display it.
sections.faq:
Q. Is GNTT Timezone Clock free?

Ans.Yeah, 1.0 version is free. But, for premium version should be paid.You will get option panel in the premium version and will change background-color, border-color as your wish.

Q. Can I use multiple display?

Ans.Yeah, it will make a display in every page, post and widget text to copy and past the shortcode “[clock]”. Where do you display it.

Q. Can I use Different size?

Ans.Yeah, to use different size you have to use premium version.Similarly you can change background-color, border-color as your wish.
